articles.author: ISABEL DEBRE
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — The head of surgery at Gaza’s largest and most advanced hospital held up his phone Saturday to the hammering of gunfire and artillery shelling. “Listen,” said Dr. Marwan Abu Sada as fighting raged around Shifa Hospital.
articles.title: Hospitals have special protection under the rules of war. Why are they in the crosshairs in Gaza?

articles.author: WAFAA SHURAFA and BASSEM MROUE
articles.description: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu pushed back Saturday against growing international calls for a cease-fire, saying Israel’s battle to crush Gaza’s ruling Hamas militants will continue with “full force.”
articles.title: Netanyahu rejects growing calls for a cease-fire as Israel battles Hamas outside main Gaza hospital

articles.author: SAMY MAGDY
articles.description: CAIRO (AP) — Fighters from a paramilitary force and their allied Arab militias rampaged through a town in Sudan’s war-ravaged region of Darfur, reportedly killing more than 800 people in a multiday attack, doctors and the U.N.
articles.title: More than 800 Sudanese reportedly killed in attack on Darfur town, UN says

articles.author: JOSHUA GOODMAN, ALAN SUDERMAN and CHRIS MEGERIAN
articles.description: ELLWOOD CITY, Pa. (AP) — When a health care startup dreamed of building a network of rural hospitals several years ago, it turned to Jim Biden.
articles.title: Jim Biden's last name has helped open doors. It also has made him a target of House Republicans

articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD
articles.description: ROME (AP) — Pope Francis on Saturday ordered the removal of the bishop of Tyler, Texas, a conservative prelate active on social media who has been a fierce critic of the pontiff and has come to symbolize the polarization within the U.S.
articles.title: Pope Francis removes a leading US conservative critic as bishop of Tyler, Texas

articles.author: ALANNA DURKIN RICHER
articles.description: Donald Trump is pushing for his federal election interference trial in Washington to be televised, joining media outlets that say the American public should be able to watch the historic case unfold.
articles.title: Trump joins media outlets in pushing for his federal election interference case to be televised

articles.author: JIM GOMEZ AND JOEAL CALUPITAN
articles.description: ABOARD THE BRP CABRA (AP) — As a U.S. Navy surveillance plane flew in circles, keeping a close watch, dozens of Chinese coast guard and accompanying ships chased and encircled Philippine vessels in the latest confrontation in one of the most dangerous flashpoints in the South China Sea.
articles.title: Dozens of Chinese ships chase Philippine vessels as US renews warning it will defend its treaty ally

articles.author: JONEL ALECCIA
articles.description: The popular weight-loss drug Wegovy reduced the risk of serious heart problems by 20% in a large, international study that experts say could change the way doctors treat certain heart patients.The research is the first to document that an obesity medication can not only pare pounds, but also safely prevent a heart attack, stroke or a heart-related death in people who already have heart disease — but not diabetes.
articles.title: Obesity drug Wegovy cut risk of serious heart problems by 20%, study finds

articles.author: WILL WEISSERT and DIDI TANG
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — When President Joe Biden meets Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Wednesday, there will be no such thing as a small detail.How they greet?
articles.title: Biden and Xi are set to meet next week at the APEC summit. No detail is too small to sweat

articles.author: MELINA WALLING, AMANDA LOMAN and BROOKE HERBERT
articles.description: MOUNT ANGEL, Ore. (AP) — On a bright day this fall, tractors crisscrossed Gayle Goschie's farm about an hour outside Portland, Oregon. Goschie is in the beer business — a fourth-generation hops farmer.
articles.title: How researchers, farmers and brewers want to safeguard beer against climate change
